verses.text: \w Happy|strong="H0835"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* company \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w place|strong="H4186"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* evil-doers, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w seat|strong="H4186"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w those|strong="H0834"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w do|strong="H1870"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* give honour \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord.

\w The|strong="H0834"\w* evil-doers \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* dust \w from|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* grain, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* takes \w away|strong="H5086"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w cause|strong="H4941"\w* there \w will|strong="H6662"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* mercy \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w* \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w are|strong="H7563"\w* \w judged|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* evil-doers \w will|strong="H6662"\w* \w have|strong="H7563"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w place|strong="H4941"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* upright,
